doc:
Kane Richmond https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kane_Richmond 0 Kane Richmond (born Frederick William Bowditch, December 23, 1906 – March 22, 1973) was an American film actor of the 1930s and 1940s, mostly appearing in cliffhangers and serials. He is best known today for his portrayal of the character Lamont Cranston in The Shadow films in addition to his leading role in the successful serials Spy Smasher and Brick Bradford. Kane_Richmond ( born Frederick_William_Bowditch , December_23_,_1906 – March_22_,_1973 ) was an_American_film_actor of the_1930s_and_1940s , mostly appearing in cliffhangers_and_serials . He is_best_known today for his_portrayal of the_character_Lamont_Cranston in The_Shadow_films in addition to his_leading_role in the_successful_serials_Spy_Smasher and Brick_Bradford .
